LanguageData.WorkTab.DetailedColumnTip: Shift + left-click or scroll up to increase priorities\nShift + right click or scroll down to decrease priorities
LanguageData.WorkTab.ToggleColumnTip: Shift + left-click or scroll up to toggle priorities on\nShift + right click or scroll down to toggle priorities off
LanguageData.WorkTab.ExpandWorkgiversColumnTip: Ctrl + click to expand list of detailed priorities
LanguageData.WorkTab.CollapseWorkgiversColumnTip: Ctrl + click to collapse list of detailed priorities
